equipment.details: beamline SNBL at the ESRF synchrotron, λ = 0.69730 Å, Pilatus 2M detector, 146.2 mm from sample
Agilent Technologies, EosS2 CCD detector, microfocus copper source (λ = 1.54184 Å), flowing nitrogen 700 and 800 Plus series cryostats from Oxford Cryosystems

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The guest molecule benzaldehyde induces various types of SCO behavior towards the low-spin (LS, S = 0) state.

synthesis_conditions.time: 10 ns with a time step of 1 fs, 10 ns of equilibration
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Used to explore the structure of guest molecules confined within the MOF-SCO. The simulation box consisted of two unit cells with specific dimensions for LS and HS forms.
Performed to fill the porous material at 1 bar and T = 298 K (saturation).
